plot: Lack of sleep, sex, and spousal attention drive a new father to the edge as he struggles to make a bond with his infant son.
title: Second Banana
plot_es: Lack of sleep, sex, and spousal attention drive a new father to the edge as he struggles to make a bond with his infant son.
plot_en: Lack of sleep, sex, and spousal attention drive a new father to the edge as he struggles to make a bond with his infant son.
